name: See No Evil (itch) (SirScutoid)
description:
Make sure you stay quick on your step when getting ready for bed, because when you turn the lights off, the Boogeyman may already be snapping right at your heels.

Or so says the older kids at school- But those things aren't real, right?

Why does the bed seem so far away all of the sudden...


A short and sweet horror platformer, taking place within the comfort of your own home.
Made for the 2022.1 Brackey's Game Jam- "It Is Not Real".

Dev Team:
SirScutoid- Programmer, Level Designer, Composer
ABTW- Programmer, Level Designer
fishe404- Artist, Voice Actor

Credits to:
Darrell Flood- Made the 'Horrors' font on FontSpace
